jibe.sdk.client.history
Class HistoryDatabase

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      jibe.sdk.client.history.HistoryDatabase

public class HistoryDatabase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Support functionality for communication-history database operations.

setAutomaticContactIdLookup

public void setAutomaticContactIdLookup(boolean performLookup)
Controls whether the contact ID and raw contact ID that are associated with a user ID are automatically looked up when a new row is inserted into the database. Set to false for better performance.

NOTE: This currently only works for IMS, i.e. when the user ID is a phone number.

The default value is true.

Parameters:
performLookup - Set to true to perform an automatic lookup of the contact ID.

clearDatabase

public void clearDatabase()
Deletes all of the data from the database.

insertIncomingHistoryEntry

public long insertIncomingHistoryEntry(Intent intent)
                                throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-xxx history event into the database. The type of the event is detected via the action of the Intent that gets passed in: if the action is unknown, no event gets created.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent containing the incoming communication (as defined in JibeIntents).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is not an incoming communication event.

insertIncomingVideoSharing

public long insertIncomingVideoSharing(Intent intent)
                                throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-video-sharing event into the database.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-video-sharing event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_VIDEOSHARE).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or is not an incoming-video Intent.

public long insertIncomingDataSession(Intent intent)
                               throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming data-session event into the database.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-data-session event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_DATASESSION).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an incoming-data-session Intent.

insertIncomingFileTransfer

public long insertIncomingFileTransfer(Intent intent)
                                throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-file-transfer event into the database.

Parameters:
intent - Intent of the incoming file transfer event The Intent of the incoming-data-session event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_FILETRANSFER).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an file-transfer Intent.

public long insertIncomingChatSession(Intent intent)
                               throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-chat-session event into the database.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-data-session event. See JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_CHATSESSION.
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an incoming-chat-session Intent.

insertIncomingChatMessage

public long insertIncomingChatMessage(Intent intent)
                               throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-chat-message event into the database, for signal-based chat (chats that are performed out-of-session).

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-chat-message event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_CHAT_MESSAGE).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an incoming-chat-message Intent.

insertIncomingGroupChatMessage

public long insertIncomingGroupChatMessage(Intent intent)
                                    throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming group-chat-message event into the database, for signal-based chat (chats that are performed out-of-session). A new record will be created for each member of the group chat. Chat messages from within the same group chat will be identified by group chat's sessionId.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-chat-message event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_CHAT_MESSAGE).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an incoming-chat-message Intent.

insertIncomingCall

public long insertIncomingCall(Intent intent)
                        throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
Inserts an incoming-call event into the database.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent of the incoming-call event (see JibeIntents.ACTION_INCOMING_CALL).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - If the Intent is null, or not an incoming-call Intent.

insertIncomingChatMessage

public long insertIncomingChatMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      long sessionId,
                                      java.lang.String messageId)
Inserts an incoming-chat-message event into the database, for session-based chat.

Parameters:
userId - The remote party's user ID.
message - The chat message that was received.
sessionId - The session ID of the chat session.
messageId - The unique identifier of the message.
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).

insertIncomingChatMessage

public long insertIncomingChatMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      long sessionId,
                                      java.lang.String messageId,
                                      long timeStamp)
Inserts an incoming-chat message event into the database for session-based chat.

Parameters:
userId - The remote party's user ID.
message - The chat message that was received.
sessionId - The session ID of the chat session.
messageId - The unique identifier of the message.
timeStamp - The timestamp of the received message.
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).

insertIncomingGroupChatMessage

public long insertIncomingGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                                           java.lang.String message,
                                           long sessionId,
                                           java.lang.String messageId,
                                           long timeStamp)
Inserts an incoming group chat message event into the database for session based group chat

Parameters:
userId - userId of sender
message - group chat message
sessionId - sessionId
messageId - id of the message
timeStamp - timestamp
Returns:
the row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred

insertGroupStateChange

public long insertGroupStateChange(java.lang.String userId,
                                   long sessionId,
                                   long timestamp,
                                   int state,
                                   java.lang.String displayName)
Inserts group state change values for session based group chat

Parameters:
userId - userId
sessionId - sessionId
timestamp - timestamp
state - state of the event. Use:
GroupStateType.USER_JOINED for user joined
GroupStateType.USER_LEFT for user left
GroupStateType.USER_INVITE_FAILED for user invite failed
displayName - displayName of the user
Returns:
the row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred

insertGroupStateChange

public long insertGroupStateChange(java.lang.String userId,
                                   long sessionId,
                                   long timestamp,
                                   int state,
                                   java.lang.String displayName,
                                   long eventInfo)
Inserts group state change values for session based group chat

Parameters:
userId - userId
sessionId - group chat sessionId
timestamp - timestamp
state - state of event
displayName - user's name
eventInfo - Extra info for the entry. Can be one of the following:
0 - default value meaning that the info is not needed
JibeSessionEvent.INFO_USER_UNKNOWN
JibeSessionEvent.INFO_USER_NOT_ONLINE
JibeSessionEvent.INFO_SESSION_TIMEOUT
JibeSessionEvent.INFO_SESSION_REJECTED
Returns:
the row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred

insertIncomingChatSession

public long insertIncomingChatSession(java.lang.String userId,
                                      long sessionId,
                                      int chatSessionType)
Inserts an outgoing chat session into the database.

Parameters:
sessionId - Session ID of the chat session
userId - Remote party user ID
chatSessionType - Type of the chat session. Can be one of the following:
HistoryDatabaseConstants.Type.CHAT_MESSAGE
HistoryDatabaseConstants.Type.GROUP_CHAT_MESSAGE
Returns:
the row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred

insertOutgoingChatMessage

public long insertOutgoingChatMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      long sessionId,
                                      java.lang.String messageId)
Inserts an outgoing-chat-message event into the database. For signal-based chat, simply set the sessionId to -1.

Parameters:
userId - The remote party's user ID.
message - The group chat message that was sent.
sessionId - The session ID of the chat session.
messageId - The unique identifier of the message.
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).

insertOutgoingGroupChatMessage

public long insertOutgoingGroupChatMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                                           java.lang.String message,
                                           long sessionId,
                                           java.lang.String messageId)
Inserts an outgoing-group-chat-message event into the database. For signalling-based chat, simply set the sessionId to -1.

Parameters:
userId - The remote party's user ID.
message - The group chat message that was sent.
sessionId - The session ID of the chat session.
messageId - The unique identifier of the message.
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).

insertOutgoingFileTransfer

public long insertOutgoingFileTransfer(java.lang.String userId,
                                       long sessionId,
                                       java.lang.String fileName,
                                       long fileSize,
                                       byte[] previewData,
                                       java.lang.String previewContentType)
Inserts an outgoing-file-transfer event into the database.

Parameters:
userId - The remote party's user ID.
sessionId - The session ID of the file-transfer.
fileName - The name of the outgoing file (or null, if the name is not to be stored).
fileSize - The size of the file (or 0, if the size is not to be stored).
Returns:
The row ID of the newly-inserted row (or -1 if an error occurred).

updateState

public boolean updateState(long sessionId,
                           int state)
Modifies the state of an entry with a given session ID.

Parameters:
sessionId - The session ID of the entry to modify.
state - The new state to be set for the entry.
Returns:
true, if the update has been applied successfully.

updateState

public boolean updateState(long sessionId,
                           int state,
                           long info)
Modifies the state and info of an entry for a given session ID.

Parameters:
sessionId - Session ID of the entry to modify
state - The new state to set for the entry
Returns:
true if the update has been applied successfully

updateIncomingChatMessageState

public boolean updateIncomingChatMessageState(java.lang.String messageId,
                                              int state)
Modifies the state of an incoming chat message entry for a given session ID and message ID.

Parameters:
messageId - The message ID of the entry to modify.
state - The new state to set for the entry.
Returns:
true, if the update has been applied successfully.

updateIncomingChatMessageState

public boolean updateIncomingChatMessageState(java.lang.String messageId,
                                              long id,
                                              int state)
Modifies the state of an incoming chat message entry for a given session ID and message ID.

Parameters:
messageId - The message ID of the entry to modify.
id - The row id as a fallback if the messageId is null.
state - The new state to set for the entry.
Returns:
true, if the update has been applied successfully.

                                              int state)
Modifies the state of an outgoing chat message entry for a given message ID.

Parameters:
messageId - Message ID of the entry to modify
state - The new state to set for the entry
Returns:
true if the update has been applied successfully

                                   long id,
                                   boolean read)

updateFileTransferReadState

public boolean updateFileTransferReadState(long id,
                                           boolean read)

calculateDuration

public boolean calculateDuration(long sessionId)
Calculates the duration of an entry, as the difference between the creation timestamp and the current time. This time is held as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC.

Parameters:
sessionId - The session ID of the entry that is to be modified.
Returns:
true, if the update has been applied successfully
